content.p: TIME (DATE) ACTIVITY Day 1 (9 June 2022) 14:00 - 18:30 Registration & Networking 18:30 - 22:00 Welcome Party Day 2 (10 June 2022) 08:00 - 08:45 Opening Ceremony & Signing of Algal Biotechnology Consortium (ABC) 08:45 - 9:00 Plenary Talk by YABhg Tun Dr Mahathir bin Mohamad 9:00 - 9:30 Morning Break & Poster Session 9:30 - 12:30 Keynote Talk & Parallel Sessions I 12.30 – 14:00 Lunch 14:00 - 15:45 Keynote Talk & Parallel Sessions II 15:45 - 16:15 Tea Break and Poster Session 16:15 - 18:00 Keynote Talk & Parallel Sessions III 18:00 - 19:30 Visit to Poster Booth & Networking 19:30 - 22:00 Gala Dinner (Award Presentation) Day 3 (11 June 2022) 06:00 - 07:00 Breakfast at hotel 07:00 - 12:00 “One Tourist, One Tree Campaign” 12:00 – 14:00 14:00 - 18:00 Networking and meeting with industry 18:00 – 22:00 Dinner Day 4 (12 June 2022) 8:00 – 12:00 Breakfast & Check-out telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
